description.en:
The SchillingCoin is a revolutionary development of modern times. Its essential meaning is the digitization of money. It is a decentralized peer-to-peer network, which manages without a central authority or any intermediaries. 
In short, the SchillingCoin is the money of the future. The purpose of the whole is to provide all people with an independent currency, for various operations. 

In addition, SchillingCoin attempts to be the safest cryptocurrency at a low cost by rewarding all users who strengthen the network with free coins.
